page.title: 17HOUSING
page.content: The area under study is a mixture of rural and urban settlement and displays a wide variety of housing styles. There were very few buildings in the village of Lower Sundon and only one or two houses. The buildings were old cottage style compared with the larger village of Upper Sundon which has some newer style houses.The road slopes gently upwards from Lower to Upper Sundon. Upper Sundon is more modernised than Lower Sundon with the better services such as post office / general store and a park. On the corner opposite "The Crown" stands a war memorial. The two farms in the area have 19 buildings between them. Along MAnor road in Lower Sundon stands "Mead House" and "Aubers Farm" which are the two major buildings in the village.
